membership.contestantName: Reial Club Deportiu Espanyol de Barcelona

messages:
Name: Enzo Roco
Nationality: Chile
Date of Birth: August 16, 1992
Position: Defender
Current club: Elche
LaLiga clubs played for: Elche, Espanyol

Enzo Roco, the Elche defender, has played in the majority of the team's LaLiga matches in 2022/2023, making 22 appearances overall and playing 1,656 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in 19 of these appearances across their 38 fixtures and been used as a substitute on three occasions.
The last time that Roco featured in the league came on June 4 for Elche against Cádiz; a match that he played 71 minutes in during a 1-1 draw. He has been booked four times, as well as sent off once.
Last season for Elche, Roco made 30 Primera División appearances and scored one goal.
Roco moved to Elche in July 2021 from Fatih Karagümrük, for whom he made 31 league appearances in total, scoring three goals and providing one assist.

The defender debuted in a LaLiga fixture for Elche on August 31, 2014 as a substitute versus Granada at the age of 22 years and 15 days. In his LaLiga career overall, he has appeared 117 times in the competition, with three goals and just one assist.
